quickpick_card_placeholder: Select a card type to add to the landing page.
desc_global_action_card: A card showing the LWC Global Quick Actions defined in the org.
desc_record_list_card: A card showing a list of records.
desc_timed_list_card: A card showing a list of records filtered and sorted by a date/time range.
desc_finished: Finish and generate the landing page.
quickpick_sobject_record_list: Select which sObject you want to display on the Record List.
progress_message_retrieving_sobjects: Retrieving sObjects from your org, please wait...
quickpick_field_1_list: Select which field you want to display as the primary field.
quickpick_field_2_list: Select which field you want to display as the second field (or Finished to skip).
quickpick_field_3_list: Select which field you want to display as the third field (or Finished to skip).
progress_message_retrieving_fields: Retrieving list of fields for sObject.
picklist_option_finished_detail: I don't want any more fields to be displayed.
quickpick_template_select: Select which template to copy to landing_page.json.
template_chooser_default_detail: Recently viewed contacts, Accounts, and Opportunities.
template_chooser_case_detail: New Case action and the 5 most recent Cases, Accounts, and Contacts.
template_chooser_healthcare_detail: Global quick actions with Barcode Scanner, New Visitor/Visit, and more.
template_chooser_retail_detail: Global quick actions with New Oppty/Lead/Account, and more.
